channel.title: New Release Games PVP Source! (Full PVP armors and Dragon Corrupt!)
channel.description:
This is my first release so please tell me what i should fix for my next release!!!
If you use it reply and tell me what you think please!
Also if you use this source please give me credits!
USE BLUURRS CLIENT!!! I LOST GUI FILE FOR MINE SO ITS CONNECTED TO MY IP!!
MODELS FOR MY CLIENT: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wmh4zdizug2]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?wmh4zdizug2[/url]
Okay so this is my server it is PVP based, i give credits to Jinrake for the base and Demisepking for the source!
Source: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mjmyetitjnw]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?mjmyetitjnw[/url]
Okay here are features of this source!
It has fully working all PVP armors including: Statius, Vesta, Morrigan, and Zuriels!
It has properly wield able custom tyrant, apocalypse, etc. armors!
Has working energy sword! (staff only has max stats)
Fully working Dragon CORRUPT armors!!!
New Donator Zone ive added!
Also New Donator Training zone!!
Most donor items are donor wield able only for good purposes. Some arent such as barrows armor, fighter torso, etc.
3 donator shops! With donator portal, must be donator to enter!
KBD portal at home!
2 Different Skilling portals ive added! with almost every working skill!!!
i moved shops inside the lumbridge dining room!
Ive deleted the many bankers from demise's source and about half of the rock crabs so it isnt as crowded!
I also moved the lunar altar to a more reachable spot!
I added Guthix, Sara, and Zammy whips to donor shops with specials!!!
I added a different d pl8 model as well
I added a better stall with the normal silk one for better and faster cash!
Working Godwars with real drops!
Working assauly with fighter torso, fighter hat, and rune defender in shops!
Now for the Pics!
[img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0000.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0028.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0002.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0029.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0030.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0031.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0032.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0033.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0034.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0035.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0036.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0037.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0038.png[/img] [img]http://i726.photobucket.com/albums/ww265/jesusman5000/Cody/0039.png[/img]
Thats it hope you like it!! (SOURCE DL IS MEDIAFIRE, SO NO VIRUS SCAN NEEDED THEY AUTO SCAN WHEN UPLOADED!!!!)

item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“whip of soulz, post:49, topic:309002”][quote author=watch n lern link=topic=405459.msg3112375#msg3112375 date=1264642594]

This fails don’t bother arguing with me either it’s pointless.

I love how critical some of you people are over a first time release. Especially since most of the people that criticize coders cant even code themselves. Anyway i have made a better second release. and there has been like 1-2 people saying they dont like. And btw this source has over 560 downloads.
[/quote]I can code unlike you, Also moving things around isn’t coding tbh.
Also don’t ask for proof because I’m not going to I cba to take pics.[/quote]
btw i highly doubt you can code anything… and tbh i have gotten a lot better… like i said this was only my first release. you have to be so critical because you think whatever the hell you do is so much better than every one elses. and like ive said before this source has over 600 downloads so people must like it.
